description: `thunder_slb_template_tcp_proxy` Provides details about thunder slb template tcp proxy

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AckAggressiveness.description: ‘low’: Delayed ACK; ‘medium’: Delayed ACK, with ACK on each packet with PUSH flag; ‘high’: ACK on each packet;.

AliveIfActive.description: keep connection alive if active traffic.

BackendWscale.description: The TCP window scale used for the server side, default is off (number).

DelSessionOnServerDown.description: Delete session if the server/port goes down (either disabled/hm down).

Disable.description: send reset to client when server is disabled.

DisableAbc.description: Appropriate Byte Counting RFC 3465 Disabled, default is enabled (Appropriate Byte Counting (ABC) is enabled by default).

Down.description: send reset to client when server is down.

DynamicBufferAllocation.description: Optimally adjust the transmit and receive buffer sizes of TCP proxy while keeping their sum constant.

EarlyRetransmit.description: Configure the Early-Retransmit Algorithm (RFC 5827) (Early-Retransmit is disabled by default).

ForceDeleteTimeout.description: The maximum time that a session can stay in the system before being deleted, default is off (number (second)).

ForceDeleteTimeout100ms.description: The maximum time that a session can stay in the system before being deleted, default is off (number in 100ms).

HalfCloseIdleTimeout.description: TCP Half Close Idle Timeout (sec), default is off (number).

HalfOpenIdleTimeout.description: TCP Half Open Idle Timeout (sec), default is off (number).

IdleTimeout.description: Idle Timeout (Interval of 60 seconds), default is 600 (idle timeout in second, default 600).

InitCwnd.description: The initial congestion control window size (packets), default is 10 (number).

InitialWindowSize.description: Set the initial window size, default is off (number).

InsertClientIp.description: Insert client ip into TCP option.

InvalidRateLimit.description: Invalid Packet Response Rate Limit (ms), default is 500 (number default 500 challenges).

KeepaliveInterval.description: Interval between keepalive probes (sec), default is off (number).

KeepaliveProbes.description: Number of keepalive probes sent, default is off.

LimitedSlowstart.description: RFC 3742 Limited Slow-Start for TCP with Large Congestion Windows (number).

Maxburst.description: The max packet count sent per transmission event (number).

MinRto.description: The minmum retransmission timeout, default is 200ms (number).

Mss.description: Responding MSS to use if client MSS is large, default is off (number).

ReassemblyLimit.description: The reassembly queuing limit, default is 25 segments (number).

ResetFwd.description: send reset to server if error happens.

ResetRev.description: send reset to client if error happens.

RetransmitRetries.description: Number of Retries for Retransmit, default is 5.
